attributes.action: require the Royal Mail to make its Post Code file freely available at no charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Royal Mail charges people to use its Post Code Database.  This is:

a) morally wrong (see below)

b) inhibits the development of many useful computer (Web) based services to the public because of the prohibitive costs.

The Royal Mail requires local councils to supply it with details of new houses, etc to keep its database of post codes up to date.

This cost me money, via taxes, etc.

The Royal Mail then charges me to use that data.
